New_Braunfels.Calvary Baptist Academy, New Braunfels,: Calvary Baptist Academy (CBA) is a private 1st - 12th grade school located in New Braunfels, Texas in the United States. CBA is part of the educational ministry of Calvary Baptist Church, and serves not only Comal County but also the surrounding areas. Since 1981, Calvary Baptist Academy has been steadfast in its commitment to instill in its students a solid moral foundation, to provide each student with an excellent education, to partner with parents to ensure that their child receives the necessary training to be able to lead a successful Christian life, and to keep tuition low so that families in the New Braunfels and surrounding areas are able to afford it.
